mods.railcraft.api.tracks

Interface ITrackLockdown

  • All Superinterfaces:
    INetworkedObject, ITrackInstance

    public interface ITrackLockdown
extends ITrackInstance
    Any rail tile entity that can completely halt all cart movement should implement this interface. (Used in collision handling)
    Author:
    CovertJaguar
